summary: The module defines a suite of unit tests for AWS MediaLive operations, using boto3 with the Moto library to mock AWS services. It includes helper utilities to generate channel and input configuration dictionaries and a collection of test cases covering creation, description, listing, updating, starting, stopping, and deletion of MediaLive channels and inputs.
business_intent: Validate that MediaLive channel and input management functions interact correctly with the AWS API, ensuring expected behavior for CRUD and lifecycle actions in a controlled test environment.
